about.description: Sometimes quick experiments in IPython grow large and you find yourself wanting unit tests. This module aims to make testing code in IPython notebooks easy. At its core, it offers a way to run pytest tests inside the notebook environment. It is also designed to make the transfer of the tests into proper python modules easy.
about.summary: Unit tests in IPython notebooks. Supports pytest / unittest.

name: ipytest
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "ipytest" %}
{% set version = "0.5.0" %}
{% set arch = "py2.py3" %}
{% set fn = "{}-{}-{}-none-any.whl".format(name, version, arch) %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/{{ arch }}/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ fn }}
  sha256: c25e09654b2b431047ab7f381333188be2e8fc66146f1f2aed44dc105128b074
  
build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install {{ fn }} --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "

requirements:
  build:
    - python >=3
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3
    - ipython
    - pytest
 
test:
  imports:
    - ipytest

about:
  home: https://github.com/chmp/ipytest
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Unit tests in IPython notebooks. Supports pytest / unittest.'
  description: |
    Sometimes quick experiments in IPython grow large and you find yourself wanting unit tests. This module aims to make testing code in IPython notebooks easy. At its core, it offers a way to run pytest tests inside the notebook environment. It is also designed to make the transfer of the tests into proper python modules easy.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - pmgrafe
